translation.value: Recruitment Focus[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting/Recruitment; SUB-AREA:Recruitment focus dialog; FR-BN: 24174; NOTE: Recruitment focus dialog title]
Your Recruitment Team will use the details outlined below to find and suggest players that match
Choose a position[COMMENT: AREA: press conferences; FR-BN: n/a; NOTE: instructions to the user to select a press conference answer from a dropdown list, playing position]

string.value: show_name, use_player_kits_back, drop_initial_if_possible, show_selection_image, show_number, show_role_duty_labels, dont_fade_icons

translation.value: Recruitment focus name[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title of text box, where the human can set a focus' name]
Maximum 25 characters[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Subtitle of text box, where the human can set a focus' name]
Main Details[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title of the tab showing the most commonly set focus settings]
Further Details[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title of the tab showing the rest of the focus settings, not commonly set]
Transfer Type[COMMENT: transfer lists; column header, type of transfer proposed for a player]
Transfer[COMMENT: section header on Views menu to indicate that view will contain information pertaining to the person's transfer status]
Loan[COMMENT: player transfer panel; indicates which club is interested in the person and what type of deal they're looking for]
Transfer and Loan[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR: FM 3873; TONE: Formal; CHARLIMIT: Shortish; REF-ID: ; NOTE: transfer type for a recritment focus]
Current Ability[COMMENT: scout report panel box heading]
Current Ability[COMMENT: scout report panel box heading]

Sets the minimum evaluated current ability of a scouted player when compared to players in the current squad.[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Description in hint explaining what the concept of Current Ability is]
Potential Ability[COMMENT: scout report panel box heading]
Potential Ability[COMMENT: scout report panel box heading]

Sets the minimum evaluated potential ability of a scouted a player when compared to players in the current squad.[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Description in hint explaining what the concept of Potential Ability is]
Aged Between[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title of filter, where the human sets the age of the players the scouts should be looking for]
and[COMMENT: news_item; where_are_they_now_news; used to link two sentences together in a list e.g. person1 and person2]
Areas[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-12648; NOTE: Search option for which locations to send a scout]

Any[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FN: FM-4459; NOTE: Default string on the location picker popup on the recruitment focus dialog; Signifies there is no specific nation/continent/competition selected, so we are scouting any within scouting range]
Priority[COMMENT: transfers lists; column header, prioritise the importance of a particular deal]
Top[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Type of recruitment focus priority - at the upmost importance]
Standard[COMMENT: tactical team instructions; team strategy]
Ongoing[COMMENT: scout assignments panel]
Assigned Scout[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title over popup button, where one can assign scouts to the the recruitment focus]
Assigned Scout[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title over popup button, where one can assign scouts to the the recruitment focus]

By default, your scouts will be assigned to a specific focus by the Chief Scout, unless specified otherwise. One or multiple scouts can be assigned to a focus. However, a scout assigned to several focuses will take longer to complete their work.[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Hint text explaining how the scout assignment works with recruitment focuses]
Assigned Analyst[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title over popup button, where one can assign analysts to the the recruitment focus]
Assigned Analyst[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title over popup button, where one can assign analysts to the the recruitment focus]

By default, analysts will be assigned to a specific focus by the Chief Scout, unless specified otherwise. One or multiple analysts can be assigned to a focus. However, an analyst assigned to several focuses will take longer to complete their work.[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Hint text explaining how the analyst assignment works with recruitment focuses]

Any[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FN: FM-4459; NOTE: Default string on the scout picker popup on the recruitment focus dialog; Signifies there is no specific scout assigned to the given focus]

Any[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FN: FM-4459; NOTE: Default string on the analyst picker popup on the recruitment focus dialog; Signifies there is no specific analyst assigned to the given focus]
End Meeting[COMMENT: AREA: Recruitment meeting; FR-BN: 32765; NOTE: Recruitment meeting end meeting dialog popup title]

Any Position from Tactic[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FN: FM-12287; NOTE: Checkbox title for searching for players irrespective of their position, as long as they match the other filters]
Choose a role[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Title over popup button, where one can set the sought-after player's role within a recruitment focus]

Players suited to playing[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Text over popup button, where one can set the sought-after player's role within a recruitment focus]

Set the minimum proficiency to play the role[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FR-BN: FM-4456; NOTE: Subtitle over popup button, where one can set the sought-after player's role skill within a recruitment focus]
Add[COMMENT: Add button on dialogs]

*Find players who can play all selected positions[COMMENT: AREA: Scouting; SUB-AREA: Recruitment Focus Dialog; FN: FM-12287; NOTE: Hint subtitle explaining how the recruitment focus selected positions work]
